name: Some-Random
description:
Some-Random is an interactive narrative story and video game. In this game, the player follows the story of Z and his series of stories after quarantine. The game features little written dialogue and tells Z's story through 6 chapters. Interactive and puzzles are used to reinforce pieces of Z's daily life as players progress through his story.

The game metaphors Social Media Manipulation. Some-Random is a rehabilitation training center to treat someone who is manipulated. And the game is divided into six chapters, each featuring a different portion of Z's life.
